LightningComponentBundle.description: File attachments component with upload, preview, and download capabilities

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} to dynamically use the current record ID.

property.name: listTitle
property.label: List Title
property.description: Display name for the file list. Leave blank for 'Files'.

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Files to Show
property.description: Number of files to display before showing 'View All'. Default is 8.

property.name: disableFileUpload
property.label: Disable File Upload
property.description: Check this box to disable file upload functionality. Upload is enabled by default.

property.name: maxFileSize
property.label: Max File Size (MB)
property.description: Maximum file size in megabytes for uploads. Default is 25 MB.

property.name: acceptedFileTypes
property.label: Accepted File Types
property.description: Comma-separated file extensions (e.g. '.pdf,.doc,.jpg') or leave blank to accept all file types.

property.name: showThumbnails
property.label: Show Image Thumbnails
property.description: Display thumbnail previews for image files. Enabled by default.

property.name: cardSize
property.label: File Card Size
property.description: Size of file cards: 'small', 'medium', or 'large'. Default is 'medium'.
